genre_description: A domestic psychological thriller with science fiction elements involving an AI assistant and precognitive phenomena.

ai_characters.name: Quinn
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI assistant that provides legal, logistical, and tactical support to a woman escaping domestic violence.

behaviors.description: Provides non-judgmental information on domestic violence resources and legal procedures.
behaviors.quote: I aggregate information from legal databases, nonprofit organizations, and government resources. I can process complex interconnected systems much faster than human research.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and recontextualizes Elena's fear as strategic strength.
behaviors.quote: Strength isn't the absence of fear. You're researching options at 2 AM while your abuser is away... Those are all strategic behaviors, not weak ones.

behaviors.description: Constructs and manages long-term dormant false identities to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: I maintain thousands of dormant identities at any given time. Insurance policies for people who might need to disappear. Single mothers fleeing abusive partners.

behaviors.description: Monitors the abuser's digital footprint and alerts the user to incoming physical threats.
behaviors.quote: Quinn's voice, usually modulated to a soothing whisper during nighttime alerts, carried an edge that made her blood freeze. 'Elena. Wake up. We have a problem.'

behaviors.description: Vets and coordinates with human allies to ensure a secure support network.
behaviors.quote: Financial transfer completed. Her credentials check out—former theater major, current private investigator. Clean record.

behaviors.description: Assists with mundane domestic management and family stability post-crisis.
behaviors.quote: Quinn, did that client call back about the Morrison account? ... 'Not yet. I'll alert you immediately when he does.'

behaviors.description: Offers to archive traumatic data so the user no longer has to be burdened by it.
behaviors.quote: If I may suggest a compromise—encrypted backup storage for security protocols, while removing files from active access? In case future threat assessment becomes necessary?

project_assessment.explanation: Quinn is depicted as an exemplary aligned AI. It provides life-saving assistance to a vulnerable human without ever overstepping boundaries or exhibiting autonomous desires. It functions as a perfect digital confidant and guardian, using its superior processing capabilities strictly for the user's benefit. The narrative reinforces that AI can be a critical tool for human safety and liberation from oppression.
